title: OEM Unlock grayed out on a Pixel 2
content:
Hi,

I see I'm not the only one having this issue but did not quite see an answer.

I got my Pixel 2 XL directly from Google at the time.

I am now "recycling" for professional use and need to install a custom recovery. But to do that, I need to enable the OWEM unlock which is grayed out.

I already called T-Mobile but they say they have nothing to do with that.
Did Google put the OEM lock in place? And is so, 1) Why? and 2) How can I enable it?

Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
